body: Fuck that bitch ex. Shes the one responsible for everything horrible and then when they find happiness she fucking stabs him, leaving the girl and the child without a husband or father. Fucking cunt. Wouldve been a really happy story if not for that last page. At least we know how the yandere prone daughter will react (the ex is gonna get ganked), and the little buddha will let him go again. Though we know the timeline that ends up taking place in the end is the three of them together with both women pregnant, the whole family semi prisoners of the yandere daughter; still not a bad ending though.
Did he die this time or lose his memory again?
the final page the father said.we are not the father and daughter anymore,you and me are the couple from now on.
